settings.server.webServer.updates.descri: Check new releases and update your dokploy.
settings.server.webServer.updates.sugges: We suggest to update your dokploy to the latest version only if you:
Want to try the latest features
Some bug that is blocking to use some features
We recommend checking the latest version for any breaking changes before updating. Go to
settings.server.webServer.updates.latest: You are using the latest version
settings.server.webServer.updates.update: This action cannot be undone. This will update the web server to the new version.
settings.server.webServer.updates.please: Please reload the browser to see the changes
